document_data.name: Wolmad's Camp
document_data.mainbody: '''Wolmad's Camp''' was an [[Uthgardt]] thorp located in the [[Silver Marches]].
document_data.Geography: The Camp was located in a vale of the northern flanks of the [[Nether Mountains]] not far from [[Citadel Felbarr]].
document_data.Organization: A branch of the [[Sky Pony Tribe]] led by [[Wolmad Eaglewing]] lived here. They practiced banditry in the guise of "civilized" rule over the surrounding land.
document_data.Notable Inhabitants:
* War-leader [[Wolmad Eaglewing]]
* Chief lieutenant [[Morgwan Fellfoot]]
* [[Fara Icehewer]]
* [[Numa the Speaker]]
